p.d: After "Hypernuit" and "Cap Waller", "Persona" is Bertrand Belin's sixth album. The dandy singer, beloved of the critics, continues to increase a fan base that long remained confidential. Bertrand Belin is above all a voice, slow and solemn, gentle and heady. Presented by: SÃ©bastien Folin; directed by: Philippe Sommet.
